name: Home Sweet Homeoffice
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "Destroy".

Home sweet Homeoffice is a small game about the frustration of being stuck at home because of the evil virus.

Game Description  

Key Features

-Smash your head onto your table and destroy your pc!

-Let out your frustration on other devices  scattered across the room!

-Reach the end and hopefully calm down a little bit <3

Credits
  • Ditzie Doodle
  • Lots of Coding help from Stefan@DigitalPenguin
  • Soundeffects : freesound.org
